casebody.data:
Patrick J. HENDERSON, Co-Trustee of the Walton Burton James, Sr. Testamentary Trust (as Amended), Plaintiff,
v.
GARCIA MOTORRAD, LLC, d/b/a Ducati Raleigh; and Next Level Customs, LLC, Defendants,
v.
Garcia Motorrad, LLC, d/b/a Ducati Raleigh, Third-Party Plaintiff,
v.
Muse M. James and Walton James, Jr., Third-Party Defendants. No. COA15-1250. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 21, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed in part; Reversed in part, and Remanded.
